burlap.mdp.stochasticgames.world

Interface WorldObserver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MultiAgentPerformancePlotter, SGVisualExplorer, VisualWorldObserver

    public interface WorldObserver
    An interface for defining World observers. Observers are told when a game states and in what state, what each interaction in the world was as they happen, and what the final state of the world is when a game ends.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void gameEnding(State s)
      This method is called whenever a game in a world ends.
      void gameStarting(State s)
      This method is called whenever a new game in a world is starting.
      void observe(State s, JointAction ja, double[] reward, State sp)
      This method is called whenever an interaction in the world occurs.

    • Method Detail

      • gameStarting

        void gameStarting(State s)
        This method is called whenever a new game in a world is starting.
        Parameters:
        s - the state in which the world is starting.

      • observe

        void observe(State s,
             JointAction ja,
             double[] reward,
             State sp)
        This method is called whenever an interaction in the world occurs.
        Parameters:
        s - the previous state of the world
        ja - the joint action taken in the world
        reward - the joint reward received by the agents
        sp - the next state of the world

      • gameEnding

        void gameEnding(State s)
        This method is called whenever a game in a world ends.
        Parameters:
        s - the final state of the world when it ends.
